description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the BranchCache denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43506), it is essential to install the appropriate security updates for your version of Windows:

1. Identify your Windows version and build number from the list provided.
2. Download and apply the corresponding KB articles for your version:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)

**Details**:
- This update resolves an issue related to uncontrolled resource consumption that can lead to service disruption.
- Ensure your system is backed up before proceeding with the update installation.
- For manual installations, use the update packages linked above to ensure you are applying the correct updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that your system meets the required build numbers listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installations.
